start.speaker: kiupita
start.text: You came! I wasn't sure if you would.

scene_02.speaker: kiupita
scene_02.text: This whole year... every moment with you has been precious to me.

scene_03.speaker: kiupita
scene_03.text: I've fallen completely in love with you. I can't imagine my life without you in it.

scene_04.speaker: kiupita
scene_04.text: Will you... be mine? Will you be my partner, in everything?

choices.text: I need some time to think...

proposal_yes.speaker: kiupita
proposal_yes.text: You have no idea how happy you've made me! This is the best day of my life!

future.speaker: kiupita
future.text: Every day with you is an adventure. I'm so grateful we found each other.

final.text: TRUE LOVE ENDING - You found your soulmate and live happily together.

proposal_hesitate.speaker: kiupita
proposal_hesitate.text: That's okay... I understand. Take all the time you need. I'll be here.

dating.text: You continue dating, taking things at your own pace...

final_dating.text: TRUE LOVE ENDING - You're in a loving relationship, taking it one day at a time.
